item.title: Architecture
item.description: The architecture of Kaoto is designed to follow the Micro Frontends architectural style.

item.title: Add Custom View
item.description: Kaoto frontend is extendable allowing custom views when configuring steps.

item.title: Add a new DSL
item.description: Kaoto frontend is agnostic of the DSL (Domain Specific Language) used, so to add support for a new DSL we just have to implement the specific endpoints on the API.
